resources.string: Share Your Psychological condition with your family , your friend , your partner life by measuring serotonin levels.
Share Your Location with your family , your friend , your life partner
Thinking Positively with morning messages every day
Guiding you to Tools for Cognitive Behavioral Therapy, and more.

"The normal range for serotonin levels in your blood. 101 - 283 nanograms per milliliter (ng/mL) however, may differ slightly depending on the measurements and samples tested and activity
If this value decreases about the normal the value you will get notification
Low serotonin levels are an indicator to depression"

"if the value of serotonin level decrease about the normal value and getting notification you should begin same techniques
1- Relaxation and stress reduction techniques deep breathing exercises muscle relaxation.
2- Successive approximation: Each successive step builds upon the previous steps so you gain confidence as you go bit by bit
3- Food: Eat Foods Rich in Omega 3 Fatty Acids Growing evidence suggests that omega-3 fatty acids (abundant on oily fish such as sardines, salmon, and mackerel)
Whole grains are important sources of B vitamins, nutrients vital for brain health"

"4- Exercise 5 - Eat dark chocolate 6 - Getting into the outdoors, especially around trees. 7 - going to a therapist
With these steps, you can protect your family and your friend and your life partner from depression and other psychological disorders that may lead to suicide."
